slides.title: THE INTERVIEWER'S CRAFT
slides.content:
• Prep: Choose your athlete carefully.
  • Accuracy: Use reported speech correctly.
  • Energy: Practice with your partner. Sound like a pro journalist!

slides.title: THE 1-MIN INTERVIEW
slides.content:
• Student A: The Athlete.
  • Student B: The Interviewer.
  • Interview each other. Focus on content and pronunciation.
  • Your teacher will give you feedback.
